basics.name: Dixita Ganatra
basics.label: Web Developer & Designer
basics.summary: Iâ€™m a full stack web developer who's passionate about design and art. I can design and build web apps from the ground up. I have also explored roles where I am given responsibilities of leading a team or a project. I'm generally very flexible when taking new roles and responsibilities, be it technical or managerial.

work.summary: Developed and developing features like Interactive floor plans, RSVP for visitors, custom reporting, custom roles, access code generation, managing FIDO2 support for login, etc.

Developed cylinder tracking system between multiple facilities. Created openapi specs, frontend, and backend using PostgreSQL, NodeJS, React, Redux, and antd. Created wireframes and designs using Figma, Invision Studio, and Affinity Designer.
Developed Frontend of an E-commerce website/webapp using React, Next.JS, Redux, Redux Saga, antd, NodeJS, MongoDB.
Developed web applications like Auction management and Hospital management.
Designed and developed a web applications which calculates the actual measurements of clothes by placing them on canvas and placing markers on them.
Developed and maintained a website for a college using Wordpress.
